locations.Water Temple Torches Chest:
(has_bow or can_use(Dins_Fire)) and 
                can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and (Iron_Boots or can_reach(Water_Temple_High_Alcove))
locations.Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest:
(
                can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and (Iron_Boots or can_reach(Water_Temple_High_Alcove))
                and ( (has_bow and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot))) or can_weirdshot )
                ) or (can_reach(Water_Temple_High_Alcove) and Iron_Boots and can_use(Hookshot))
locations.GS Water Temple South Basement:
can_reach(Water_Temple_High_Alcove) or
                (has_explosives and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and Iron_Boots)
locations.GS Water Temple Near Boss Key Chest:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) and
                (can_reach(Water_Temple_High_Alcove) or 
                    (can_use(Longshot) and Iron_Boots and 
                        (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or keysanity) )
                )
locations.Water Temple Cracked Wall Chest:
(has_explosives and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and (Iron_Boots or can_reach(Water_Temple_High_Alcove))) 
                or (Iron_boots and can_use(Hookshot))

exits.Water Temple Dragon Head Room:
(Iron_Boots or can_reach(Water_Temple_High_Alcove)) and 
                Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)

locations.GS Water Temple Serpent River:
(Iron_Boots or can_use(Longshot)) and 
                (can_play(Song_of_Time) or (Hoverboots and can_use(Longshot))) and (Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6)

exits.Water Temple River Chest Hallway:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or keysanity) and 
                (can_play(Song_of_Time) or ((has_bombs or Hoverboots) and can_use(Longshot)) and has_bow)

locations.Water Temple Dragon Chest:
has_bombchus or can_weirdshot or (Iron_Boots and can_use(Hookshot)) 
                or can_reach(Water_Temple_River_Chest_Hallway)
